mapper.insert:
insert into merchant_product ( id, merchant_product_serial_number, merchant_id, standard_product_unit_id, product_category, name, is_visible, sale_price, market_price, status, sale_way, freight_explain, shipments_explain, platform_id, enterprise_id, supplier_id, is_spu_keyword, demo_sale_price, competing_sale_price, store_id, buy_type, front_serial_number, jd_profit )values
(#{po.id}, #{po.merchantProductSerialNumber}, #{po.merchantId}, #{po.standardProductUnitId}, #{po.productCategory}, #{po.name}, #{po.isVisible}, #{po.salePrice}, #{po.marketPrice}, #{po.status}, #{po.saleWay}, #{po.freightExplain}, #{po.shipmentsExplain}, #{po.platformId}, #{po.enterpriseId}, #{po.supplierId}, #{po.isSpuKeyword}, #{po.demoSalePrice}, #{po.competingSalePrice}, #{po.storeId}, #{po.buyType}, #{po.frontSerialNumber}, #{po.jdProfit} )

insert into merchant_product ( id, name, sale_price, market_price, demo_sale_price, competing_sale_price, jd_profit )values
(#{po.id}, #{po.name}, #{po.salePrice}, #{po.marketPrice}, #{po.demoSalePrice}, #{po.competingSalePrice}, #{po.jdProfit} )
on duplicate key update name=VALUES (name), sale_price=VALUES (sale_price), market_price=VALUES (market_price), demo_sale_price=VALUES (demo_sale_price), competing_sale_price=VALUES (competing_sale_price), jd_profit=VALUES (jd_profit)

UPDATE merchant_product mp,merchant_prod_describe mpd
mp.merchant_product_serial_number = #{merchantProductSerialNumber},
mp.merchant_id = #{merchantId},
mp.standard_product_unit_id = #{standardProductUnitId},
mp.merchant_cate_tree_node_id = #{merchantCateTreeNodeId},
product_category = #{productCategory},
mp.merchant_series_id = #{merchantSeriesId},
mp.name = #{name},
mp.alias = #{alias},
mp.is_visible = #{isVisible},
mp.subtitle = #{subtitle},
mp.supplier_id = #{supplierId},
mp.type = #{type},
mp.remark = #{remark},
mp.sale_price = #{salePrice},
mp.sale_tax_rate = #{saleTaxRate},
mp.return_days = #{returnDays},
mp.replacement_days = #{replacementDays},
mp.guarantee_days = #{guaranteeDays},
mp.is_vat_invoice = #{isVatInvoice},
mp.is_vip_card = #{isVipCard},
mp.is_enable_shelfLife = #{isEnableShelflife},
mp.shelfLife_days = #{shelflifeDays},
mp.is_vendible = #{isVendible},
mp.gross_weight = #{grossWeight},
mp.net_weight = #{netWeight},
mp.code = #{code},
mp.merchant_brand_id = #{merchantBrandId},
mp.market_price = #{marketPrice},
mp.promotion_price = #{promotionPrice},
mp.status = #{status},
mp.sale_way = #{saleWay},
mp.sold_base = #{soldBase},
mp.freight_explain = #{freightExplain},
mp.shipments_explain = #{shipmentsExplain},
mp.freight_template_id = #{freightTemplateId},
mp.create_time = #{createTime},
mp.update_time = #{updateTime},
mp.platform_id = #{platformId},
mp.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId},
mp.supplier_id = #{supplierId},
mpd.content = #{content},
mp.stock_warning = #{stockWarning},
mp.create_userid = #{createUserid},
mp.create_username = #{createUsername},
mp.create_userip = #{createUserip},
mp.create_usermac = #{createUsermac},
mp.update_userid = #{updateUserid},
mp.update_username = #{updateUsername},
mp.update_userip = #{updateUserip},
mp.update_usermac = #{updateUsermac},
mp.is_spu_keyword = #{isSpuKeyword},
mp.demo_sale_price = #{demoSalePrice},
mp.competing_sale_price = #{competingSalePrice},
mp.store_id = #{storeId},
mp.presell_period = #{presellPeriod},
mp.relevance_su_id = #{relevanceSuId},
mp.buy_type = #{buyType},
mp.front_serial_number = #{frontSerialNumber}
WHERE mp.id = mpd.merchant_product_id and mp.id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into merchant_product ( id, sale_price, market_price, demo_sale_price, competing_sale_price, status, is_visible, jd_profit )values
(#{po.id}, #{po.salePrice}, #{po.marketPrice}, #{po.demoSalePrice}, #{po.competingSalePrice}, #{po.status}, #{po.isVisible}, #{po.jdProfit} )
on duplicate key update sale_price=VALUES (sale_price), market_price=VALUES (market_price), demo_sale_price=VALUES (demo_sale_price), competing_sale_price=VALUES (competing_sale_price), status=VALUES (status), is_visible=VALUES (is_visible), jd_profit=VALUES (jd_profit)
mapper.update:
UPDATE merchant_product mp,product_unit pu
mp.is_visible = 1, mp.status = 4, pu.status=4
WHERE mp.merchant_id=6 AND pu.merchant_product_id=mp.id

UPDATE merchant_product mp,product_unit pu,jd_product jp,jd_product_inner_id jpii
mp.is_visible = 0, mp.status = 3, pu.status=3
WHERE mp.merchant_id=6 AND jpii.inner_pu_id=pu.id AND jp.id=jpii.jd_sku_id AND jpii.inner_su_id=mp.id AND jp.profit>= #{profit} AND jp.product_create_time is not NULL
